name: Activity Ball for Age 1 Year+
description: Activity ball for 12 months plus infantAbout the product:Funskool presents this amazing Activity Ball for young kids to help them learn about colors and numbers in the easiest way. The Funskool Activity Ball comes with 12 easy-to-fit segments which when assembled together turn into a colorful and attractive ball. Your child can easily assemble the parts together and roll them on the floor to have endless hours of fun. Playing with this amazing toy enables the development of color identification skills in your kid. Besides keeping your little one entertained for hours, this Activity Ball also develops hand-to-eye coordination and fine motor skills in your child. A fun learning kit, this playset also develops basic counting skills in your kid.Contents:12 E-shaped links2 ringsKey FeaturesEasy to grip for little handsEnables the development of color identification skills in children2 easy to fit segmentsDevelops hand-eye coordination and motor skillsHelps in developing basic counting skillsAssemble & rollDevelops colour recognitionDevelops child's observation skillsThe product is covered under Mandatory Certification of BISDisclaimer: Colour and content of the product may vary from illustration
